meanings.definition: The action or faculty of remembering something.
meanings.sent1: Her recollections of the party were filled with joy.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy looking back on my recollections of childhood.
meanings.sent3: His recollections of the camping trip made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The recollections of her childhood danced in her mind like colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The vivid recollections of the beach vacation stayed with her for years.

meanings.definition: The process of remembering past events or experiences.
meanings.sent1: The recollections of her wedding day brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: Recollections of the old town flooded back as she walked its streets.
meanings.sent3: His recollections of the failed experiment were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The recollections of his childhood were like a movie playing in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The recollections of the war painted a vivid picture of the past.

meanings.sent1: Her recollections of the family reunion were heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: He shared his recollections of the school play with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The recollections of the silly prank still made them chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The recollections of her first pet were like a treasure chest of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The recollections of the holiday season brought a smile to her face.
